I'm having the same problem that a lot of people seem to be reporting. Whenever I insert my disk with the .mdf file burnt on it, I autorun it. 

I get the music followed by a user control window. Whenever I click accept, the music stops and the disk begins to be read. Eventually, it gives me the following error:

http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/4814/erroresivo.png

I am running Windows Vista Home Premium 32bit. If you or anyone else has a solution to this, please post it or consider looking into it. This looks like such a great torrent and game and I'd hate to pass it up because of a little thing like this.
I forgot to mention, I get a similar error whenever I attempt to perform the installation on a virtual drive. It keeps asking for the "original disk".
My computer is a win7 64bit, and it runs fine. Wish I knew how to fix your problem.
